naslov: Prodaja, Kuća, Samostojeća, Zadarska županija, Vir (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se odlična novoizgrađena kuća s bazenom na otoku Viru, samo 100m od mora te s odličnim pogledom na more. Površina kuće je 257,65m2 te je izgrađena na zemljištu površine 553m2. Kuća se sastoji od podruma, prizemlja i prvog kata. U podrumu nalazimo strojarnicu dok je je prizmelju raspored prostorija sljedeći: kuhinja s blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom, wc, spavaća soba s kupaonom, hodnik i natkrivena terasa. Na prvom katu nalazimo četiri spavaće sobe s vlastitom kupaonom, natkrivena terasa na koju se može izaći iz dvije sobe. U dvorištu je dostupan parking za pet automobila te bazen površine 43m2. Kuća je izgrađena 2022. godine. Fasadna termo izolacija je debljine 10cm. Ugrađeni su PVC prozori s roletama, troslojim staklom i komarnicima. Podovi su prekriveni pločicama. Klima uređaji su postavljeni u dnevnom boravku te u svakoj spavaćoj sobi. Bazen je odrađen s pripremom za grijanje. U dvorištu još nalazimo vanjski tuš, navodnjavanje te stabla maslina. Više informacija i razgledavanje: Telefon: +385 99 701 6618 Email: marin.roncevic@c21.hr ---------------------------------------- ENGLISH: An excellent newly built house for sale with a swimming pool on the island of Vir, only 100m from the sea and with a great sea view. The surface of the house is 257.65 m2 and it was built on a plot of land of 553 m2. The house consists of a basement, ground floor and first floor.In the basement we find the engine room, while on the ground floor the layout of the rooms is as follows: kitchen with dining room and living room, toilet, bedroom with bathroom, corridor and covered terrace.On the first floor, there are four bedrooms with their own bathrooms, a covered terrace that can be accessed from two rooms.Parking for five cars and a 43m2 swimming pool are available in the yard.The house was built in 2022. Facade thermal insulation is 10 cm thick. PVC windows with shutters, triple-glazed glass and mosquito nets are installed. The floors are covered with tiles. Air conditioners are installed in the living room and in each bedroom. The pool is finished with preparation for heating. In the yard we also have an outdoor shower, irrigation and olive trees. More information and sightseeing: Phone: +385 99 701 6618 Email: marin.roncevic@c21.hr
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Josipa Bana Jelačića 1d, 23000 Zadar, Zadarska, Hrvatska
